kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Lumpia Eggrolls
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Eggrolls stuffed with seasoned ground beef, fresh carrots, garlic, water chestnuts, and green onions fried to crispy perfection.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Bourbon Chicken
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: The fan favorite! Bourbon marinated chicken grilled to perfection over an open flame, served with white jasmine rice. *Upgrade pancit noodles for an additional $2

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Marinated Fried Wings
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Kuya Kevin's favorite! Jumbo wings marinated in sinigang juices then fried to a crunchy finish. No sauce needed for this one. Caution, very addicting!

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Pork BBQ On A Stick
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Marinated pork sliced and grilled to perfection skewered with an onion and pepper medley.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Chicken Adobo
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Soy sauce and vinegar marinated chicken slow cooked and shredded. Served over a bed of fresh white jasmine rice. *Upgrade pancit noodles for an additional $2

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Chicken Pancit
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Bihon and Vermicelli noodles cooked in soy sauce and chicken broth, tossed in a wok alongside fresh cabbage, carrots, onions, and celery.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Filipino Poutine
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: A twist on a Canadian classic! Hot and fresh steak fries topped with lumpia eggroll meat, shredded cheese, and homemade adobo gravy.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Pork Sisig
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Smoked and deep fried pork belly, chopped and saut√©ed with onions and calamansi juice. Served over a bed of silky white rice.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Birria Tacos
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Your choice of pork sisig or chicken adobo, topped with melted cheese, cilantro, onions, and yummy sauce, grilled and pressed in a corn tortilla.

kuyaKevinsMenu.name: Beverages
kuyaKevinsMenu.description: Proudly serving Coke products including Coca-Cola, Diet Coke, and Sprite. Bottled Water available for $2
